The 2009 Indianapolis Colts improved upon their 12â4 record from 2008 as well as winning their sixth AFC South division championship in seven years. The Colts also clinched the #1 playoff seed in the [[American Football Conference|AFC]]. The Colts became the sole undefeated team after week 15. The following week, the Colts lost to the New York Jets.
